text: Stephen Lewis (17 December 1926 - 12 August 2015) was an English actor, comedian, director, screenwriter, and playwright. He was best known for his roles as Inspector Cyril "Blakey" Blake in the LWT sitcom On the Buses, Clem "Smiler" Hemmingway in Last of the Summer Wine, and Harry Lambert in BBC Television's Oh, Doctor Beeching!. ==Other websites== * * Interview with Stephen Lewis Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English television actors Category:English television writers Category:English television directors Category:English playwrights Category:Actors from London Category:Writers from London Category:Comedians from London
title: Stephen Lewis (actor)
